name: James Bond 007: Tehtävä Suomessa
overview: James Bond 007: Tehtävä Suomessa (Mission in Finland) is an unofficial/unlicensed Finnish language James Bond themed charset graphic text adventure for the Commodore 64. It's based on the book Icebreaker (which was written by John Gardner). The book was released under the name James Bond 007: Tehtävä Suomessa in Finland, hence the name of this adventure. The game itself was developed by Miikka Tauren and released by Jedi Software. The year of release is currently unknown.
